title: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days are here: All the best deals of the big sale
content:
Amazon's second big Prime Day shopping event is here. Known as the Prime Big Deal Days, the two-day sale-a-thon comes with plenty of deals on some of our favorite tech gear, including laptops, smartphones, routers, and tools from brands such as Apple, Lenovo, Kindle, Dyson, DeWalt, HP, Logitech, Vitamix, and more. Whether you want to splurge on yourself or you're shopping for a loved one ahead of the busy holiday season, you can find some discounts on practical tech for your home or office or luxurious gadgets like headphones and massage guns. We also have additional coverage of the Prime Big Deal Days event for you to peruse and shop:

  • Big Deal Days tech deals that don’t require a Prime membership
  • Amazon Prime Big Deal Days sale on DeWalt power tools, EDC gear, and more
  • The best laptop deals aren’t on Amazon. Here’s where to shop during Prime Big Deal Days
  • Upgrade your home office with an ergonomic chair from Amazon Prime Big Deal Days sales
  • The best headphones on sale for Amazon Prime Big Deal Days
  • The best Amazon Prime Big Deal Days savings on Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox games

Be sure to check back frequently, as we'll be updating this special Dealmaster edition with new sales throughout the shopping event.

Laptops and PCs

1440 p at 240 Hz now available.
